claim_card.claim: The paper claims Φ-plateaus align with (i) quantum decoherence thresholds, (ii) laminar re-entrance zones in turbulence, and (iii) gravitational horizon thermodynamics.
claim_card.test_hook: For each domain, define an independent regime-change marker; test temporal alignment with detected Φ-plateaus.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: In quantum systems, Φ-plateaus coincide with decoherence thresholds
